moduleMetadataJson.name: Foxit Reader Authorization Bypass
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module exploits an authorization bypass vulnerability in Foxit Reader
        build 1120. When an attacker creates a specially crafted pdf file containing
        an Open/Execute action, arbitrary commands can be executed without confirmation
        from the victim.
author: MC <mc@metasploit.com>
Didier Stevens <didier.stevens@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: DisablePayloadHandler
options.description: Disable the handler code for the selected payload
